alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:25PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Goliad County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Goliad, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Weesatche, Weser, Ander and Charco. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 650. US Highway 59 between mile markers 662 and 678. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
